programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: Landsat

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds

programme.title: The Big Bang

programme.title: Night Fire

programme.title: The Hot Zone

programme.title: Water Worlds

programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord, S01E09, The Doctor and Mel are taking a rest aboard the Hyperion III when a series of murders lead them to suspect there is more to Professor Laskey's party than it initially appears...
programme.category: Science fiction, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series

programme.title: Part 10
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord, S01E10, The Vervoids begin to attack the crew and passengers, while someone kills a Mogarian who isn't really a Mogarian at all, but an old friend of the Doctor's...
programme.category: Science fiction, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series

programme.title: Part 11
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord, S01E11, The Commadore loses command of his ship as Bruchner takes over the bridge, intending to send the Hyperion III into the black hole of Tartarus to destroy the Vervoids forever.
programme.category: Science fiction, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series

programme.title: Part 12
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord, S01E12, The Doctor realises that if he can speed up the Vervoids life span with light, they will decay. Using vionesium, he does so, unwittingly causing genocide in the process...
programme.category: Science fiction, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series

programme.title: Part 13
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord, S01E13, The Valeyard's true identity is revealed and the trial aborted, but the Doctor and Mel must pursue his new enemy into the Matrix itself, where nothing is quite what it seems…
programme.category: Science fiction, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series

programme.title: Part 14
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord, S01E14, Mel realises that the Valeyard has created a weapon within the Matrix that will destroy the Time Lords, and the Doctor is forced to rely on the Master for help...
programme.category: Science fiction, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2011, A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E09, When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Little Girl Lost
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E01, Halloween in a small town is canceled indefinitely when a young girl is kidnapped and killed on her way home from a costume party.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E14, A serial rapist seals his own fate when he sends a taunting letter to police. And when a man is found dead in South Dakota, his head bashed in by a 50-pound rock, investigators go on a 20-year search for the killers.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Dark Angel
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E14, 13 days after Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert. When a second victim is discovered in a mineshaft, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: Officer Down
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E06, The longest-running cold case of a law enforcement officer in the United States was the murder of Sheriff's Lt. Joe Clark.

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E11, Police solve an old murder case with a painstaking examination of the tool mark on the plastic flex cuff that bound the victim's hands, and a 15-year-old murder case is finally cracked open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E06, In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E01, Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.
MST3K: Doctor Mordrid, 20220610000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.
MST3K: Demon Squad, 20220624000000 +0000, Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.
MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger, 20220722000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch Gamera save the day at Osaka's Expo '70, in GAMERA VS JIGER (1970). Pearl tries to convince Kinga to take a break.
MST3K: The Batwoman, 20220819000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch a scantily-clad Mexican superhero take on a mad scientist and his aquatic super-soldiers in THE BATWOMAN (1968).
MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru, 20220902000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.
MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come, 20220930000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch three humans and their robot friend defend the moon colonies in H.G. Well's THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME (1979).
MST3K: The Mask, 20221028000000 +0000, For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.
MST3K: The Bubble, 20221111000000 +0000, Joel's crew watch as a married couple find themselves trapped in a mysterious town in THE BUBBLE (1966). The test subjects hatch a plan to escape.
MST3K: The Christmas Dragon, 20221216000000 +0000, All three hosts watch a group of precocious orphans attempt save a dying Father Christmas in THE CHRISTMAS DRAGON (2014).

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. Abby returns to Maryland when she receives a phone call from her sister.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part One
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunites in Chesapeake Shores for the first time in years.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part Two
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunion weekend continues.

Redwood Curtain, 19950423000000 +0000, A story of an Amer-Asian girl, with the reluctant approval of her adoptive parents, seeks her natural father in the redwood forests of Northern California. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

Remember Sunday, 20130421000000 +0000, A down-on-her-luck waitress meets jewelry store clerk, Gus, but complications ensue because of his memory problems. A brain aneurysm three years earlier gives Gus a blank slate the second his alarm wakes him each day.

The Blackwater Lightship, 20040204000000 +0000, Based on the novel by Colm Toibin, The Blackwater Lightship tells the compelling story of reconciliation between three generations of women that has been marked by decades of misunderstandings.
Nearlyweds, 20130112000000 +0000, Complications arise when three women (Danielle Panabaker, Jessica Parker Kennedy) learn that their marriages are not official.
Come Dance at My Wedding, 20090606000000 +0000, A woman (Brooke Nevin) faces opposition from her estranged father (John Schneider) when she plans to sell the family's dance studio.

Cedar Cove, 20130720000000 +0000, When Olivia Lockhart (Andie MacDowell) is given the opportunity for a federal judgeship, she must face the challenging decision, and while tempting, she risks losing her new romance and leaving the town and people she loves most.

Away & Back, 20150125000000 +0000, Jack Peterson, a widowed father of three young children, encounters Ginny Newsom, a wildlife biologist, whose mission is tracking trumpeter swans, a family of which settles on a pond on the Peterson farm.

Missing Pieces, 20000206000000 +0000, A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Divide And Conquer
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E05, When an SGC soldier under the influence of a Goa'uld mind-control device attempts to assassinate a High Council member, SG-1 must uncover other potential assassins, even amongst themselves, before the president arrives for a crucial Summit meeting!

programme.title: Window Of Opportunity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E06, After a visit to a strange planet in the middle of a geomagnetic storm they find themselves repeating the same day over and over again. The team must utilize their accumulated knowledge to stop the time loop before there are disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Watergate
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E07, SG-1 joins forces with a Russian scientist to investigate a rogue Stargate in Siberia, linked to a mysterious water planet. The team must venture via submarine to the water planet, where they encounter an unexpectedly terrifying alien presence.

programme.title: The First Ones
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E08, During an archaeological survey of fossils on a Goa'uld planet, Daniel is abducted by a fearsome creature, prompting SG-1 to embark on a mission to free him. But Daniel soon learns that the creature's intentions are not what he thought!

programme.title: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E09, After relocating an endangered civilization to a safe new planet, the team realizes that another race of aliens is planning to incinerate the planet's surface to make it inhabitable. Will SG-1 be able to reason with the marauding aliens?

programme.title: Beneath The Surface
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E10, With memories erased and identities changed, SG-1 find themselves trapped below a domed city on a planet of ice, toiling as slave laborers. Can they come to their senses and make a break for the surface, or will they remain enslaved underground?

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E18, Teyla, more determined than ever to find the missing Athosians, convinces Sheppard to travel with her to a trading settlement in search for answers. What they find there leads them to startling discovery that no one could have anticipated.

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E19, After an unforeseen return, Dr. Carson Beckett shares that he has been held captive. As Teyla is re-united with some missing fellow Athosians, she begins to formulate a plan to ensure their escape, if she is able to find them in time.

programme.title: The Last Man
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E20, Disheartened by another unsuccessful search for Teyla, Lt. Colonel Sheppard returns to Atlantis and senses that something is not right—the city has been abandoned. Now, McKay sets out on a risky plan to reverse a future that went horribly wrong.

programme.title: Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E01, As Sheppard and Ronon are trapped beneath a collapsed compound, McKay and Lorne are trapped in another pocket of debris. Michael’s flagship Wraith Cruiser hurtles towards the compound, while Carter leads a rescue mission. Who will reach them first?

programme.title: The Seed
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E02, When Dr. Keller fails to report for her shift, concerned team members are shocked to discover her unconscious in her quarters. With the situation on Atlantis escalating, Woolsey is ultimately faced with a decision that could cost Keller her life.

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E03, During an off-world mission, Ronon (Jason Momoa) is ambushed and captured by his former friend, Tyre (Mark Dacascos), and turned over to the Wraith. As the team scrambles for leads to locate their friend, Ronon undergoes a torturous ordeal.

programme.title: The Daedalus Variations
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E04, A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.

programme.title: The Ghost In The Machine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E05, After a series of anomalies and power disruptions, the Atlantis team is faced with an impossible decision: to create the means to release an mysterious entity or stand by as it systematically destroys the city’s technological infrastructure.

programme.title: Faith
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E13, Dwindling supplies, tedious routines, and low morale continue to plague the crew of the Destiny when the ship suddenly drops out of FTL and enters the orbit of an uncharted star. But, for the first time, the countdown clock doesn’t activate!

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E14, Disregarding orders, Dr. Rush links himself to the Destiny’s computer via the neural interface chair, hoping it will reveal the code needed to control Destiny’s flight path. Learning of this, Col. Young struggles with letting Rush risk his life.

programme.title: Lost
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E15, Trapped beneath ruins in an underground maze, some of the Destiny's crew are stranded when the ship jumps back into FTL. The situation grows even more desperate when Rush (Robert Carlyle) learns that Destiny will soon be leaving the galaxy!

programme.title: Disappearing Act
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E04, Kelly helps Jimmy treat a bleeding cut, and panics after getting some blood on her hand. David refuses to tell his father that he has dropped out of school. Brandon and Mark hire a confident young woman as their news anchor.

programme.title: Housewarming
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E06, David and Mark throw a big party at their house. Clare catches Steve kissing another girl. Valerie comes clean with Brandon about her affair with Kenny.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E07, Kenny orders Valerie to terminate her pregnancy. Steve is miffed when Clare chooses to go to the Halloween concert with egotistical Dick Harrison. Brandon and Tracy spend time together at the club.

programme.title: The Things We Do For Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E08, Steve overhears Val discussing her pregnancy on the phone. David's grandfather leaves him $250,000 and a 1961 Thunderbird. An uncomfortable Tracy decides to quit her TV job after Brandon nixes a relationship.

programme.title: Loser Take All
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E09, Brandon goes to see Kenny, who portrays himself as an innocent victim caught on the web of an evil vixen. Mel, worried by David's newfound wealth, asks Donna to keep an eye on him. Steve impresses Clare with his dedication as he trains for the crew race.

programme.title: If I Had A Hammer
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E11, During must see a psychiatrist after displaying hostile behavior. Mel agrees with the doctor's recommendation that David be held 72 hours for observation. Steve faces plagiarism charges. The gang helps Willie build a house.

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E12, Steve elects to plead guilty, leaving his punishment to the lenient Chancellor Arnold. Brandon refuses to plead guilty to a crime he did not commit, and faces a hearing and possible expulsion. Felice objects to Donna's renewed relationship with David.

programme.title: Unnecessary Roughness
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E15, Donna believes she has solved the mystery of her stalker's identity when she sees Garrett Slan, the man who tried to rape her, at the university.

programme.title: Face-Off
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E16, Donna's request for a permanent restraining order against Slan is denied. Tracy accidentally tells Brandon that she loves him. Steve and Clare consider living together as they spend a weekend house sitting. David takes an interest in a young singer.

programme.title: We Interrupt This Program
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E17, Donna's stalker confesses and holds the entire staff of the TV station hostage.

programme.title: With This Ring
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E19, Brandon and Kelly each confess their feelings to friends, but expect the other person to make a move. Donna tries to reconcile with David. Steve and Clare double date with Ryan and his girlfriend.

programme.title: A Ripe Young Age
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E20, Donna and David visit her grandmother in San Luis Obispo. Noting a striking resemblance between David and her late husband, Mrs. Martin tells the couple about her romance with Donna's grandfather.

programme.title: Storm Warnings
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E21, Joey returns to the beach apartment. Rob irritates his manager by seeking Val's advice about whether to sign on for a new movie. Jim and Cindy invite Brandon to spend spring vacation in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E22, Brandon and Tracy visit Jim in Hong Kong; Cindy is in London helping Brenda cope with mononucleosis. Clare and Steve encourage Kelly to go out instead of moping around the apartment.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E23, Mariah comes to town to give a lecture at the university's new age festival. She develops an instant connection with Kelly, prompting Tracy to bristle. David tries to plan a special evening for Donna.

programme.title: All That Jazz
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E26, Brandon has to take care of Kelly and Valerie, who are both laid up with the flu. The girls discuss the reasons for their feud.

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E27, Kelly learns that she is pregnant. Val makes a pass at David, prompting Donna to order him to end their working relationship. Clare is saddened by Mother's Day, so Steve tries to take her mind off things by going for a drive.

programme.title: Firefighter/Mattress Mayhem
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E108, Firefighter has heart attacking during a call / Emergency personnel respond to account of screaming woman

programme.title: Prison EMTs, Part 2/Out on a Limb
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E322, A prison inmate fakes an illness and hijacks an ambulance. A 3-year-old boy is stranded atop a 30-foot pine tree,

programme.title: Ex RN Son/Sparkletts Dalmation
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E202, A nurse witnesses and goes to help an accident. A pet Dalmatian slips 80 feet down into a storm drain.

programme.title: Phoenix Flood, Part 2/Toddler Glass
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E204, A woman driving through the desert is swept away during a flash flood. A child fell through a plate glass window.

programme.title: Teen Angel/Parrot Save
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E188, A piece of scrap metal flies through the windshield and injures a driver. A family's parrot detects a gas leak and saves their lives.

programme.title: Cincin Neonatal Doc/6 Yr Old Hero

programme.title: Mahalo Hawaii
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E02, Amidst the chaos, the new Baywatch Hawaii team must learn to work and live together. Jason meets a man with a mysterious past. A girl Mitch saved suffers from secondary drowning, leading to a critical test of the new recruits.

programme.title: Weak Link
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E03, Tanner visits Mitch, tours the Islands, and befriends a dying girl. After failing her initial "test", Dawn challenges Sean to a dangerous contest with her future at Baywatch hanging in the balance. JD competes to join the America's Cup Sailing Team.

programme.title: Shark Island
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E04, Tanner believes The Shark Island Legend. Mitch doesn't. Team Baywatch competes with the Coast Guard. Jessie and Kekoa both dump JD. Swimming naked in a Hawaiian purification ritual, Jesse has to make a rescue in the nude.

programme.title: Strike Team
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E05, Sean leads Team Baywatch on a daring night rescue in shark-infested waters to save 6 kayaking teens stranded off the perilous Na Pali coast.

programme.title: Sunday in Kauai
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E06, Jessie and Kekoa battle each other even as they rescue a man stranded behind a waterfall! Sean and Allie search for treasure. JD and Jason help two girls save a cat caught on a boat mast, but wind up catapulting it across the water!

programme.title: Risk to Death
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E07, Sean threatens to kick Jason off the team after Jason defies his orders and makes a daring rescue. Allie, Dawn, and Nick have to save a drowning man and his pregnant wife about to give birth in the ocean.

programme.title: Father of the Groom
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E08, Sean is faced with a life-or-death decision during a daring cave rescue in which Kekoa faces her greatest fear. Hobie plans to get married, but Mitch is at odds with his fiancée’s obnoxious parents.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E09, The Team hunts men mutilating sharks for their fins. Jason, who's always feared sharks, learns to accept the local tradition that sharks are sacred protectors of the Hawaiian Islands.

programme.title: Gold from the Deep
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E10, Allie discovers a rare Hawaiian coin from a ship that sank after the Pearl Harbor attack. Sean lets the team dive for sunken treasure provided it doubles as a training exercise. The deep-sea dive leads to discord, dissent, and explosive danger.

programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E11, Allie is terrified she may lose the love of her life when Nick gets the bends in a daring attempt to rescue a mini-sub on the ocean floor.

programme.title: Path of Least Resistance
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E12, A dark secret from Dawn's past could jeopardize her career as a Baywatch Hawaii Lifeguard. JD puts his new invention, a double scuba fin, to the test trying to rescue a young boy being sucked into whirring propeller blades in a storm vent.

programme.title: Liquid Visions
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E13, Dawn and Sean are drawn to the strange and spiritual powers of the mind. Kekoa, Allie and Jessie try to save lives after disaster strikes at a party.

programme.title: Lines in the Sand
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E14, Sean has mixed feelings about Jenna, the beautiful but smug new head of North Shore Lifeguards. When nudists protest on the beach, Sean and Jenna have to work intimately together to save the day, if they don't kill each other first!

programme.title: Thunder Tide
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E15, Kekoa, Dawn and Allie reexamine their femininity. Jason rehearses a love scene with a sexy actress. JD tries to rebound from his breakup with Jessie.

programme.title: Breath of Life
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E16, Dawn saves a skydiver who could be her ex-boyfriend in disguise. Jason is assigned to a Beach where he has to confront a terrible incident from his past.

programme.title: Big Island Heat
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E17, Jason falls for a Kahuna's beautiful granddaughter. Jenna wants to take over the team and shut down the training center she thinks is a waste of money. Sean vows to fight her.

programme.title: The Hero
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E18, Sean reveals a secret to Jenna that could threaten his job. Allie and Jason fly her helicopter to the big island where they have to rescue four people trapped on a volcanic lava reef.
